languages.text: "Это орудие боли, элантах. Палач, созданный развращенностью темных кузенов. Живая плоть, единенная с механизмом, единственная цель которой — причинить как можно больше боли". {n}Лицо Ирлиэт искажают горечь и отвращение.{/n}

"This is an Engine of Pain, elantach. An executioner created by the depravity of my twisted cousins, living flesh fused to a mechanism whose sole purpose is to inflict as much pain as it can." {n}Yrliet's face is contorted with bitterness and disgust.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Это орудие боли, элантах. Палач, созданный развращенностью темных кузенов. Живая плоть, единенная с механизмом, единственная цель которой — причинить как можно больше боли". {n}Лицо Ирлиэт искажают горечь и отвращение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "This is a pain engine, elantach. An executioner created by the depravity of my dark cousins, living flesh fused to a mechanism whose sole purpose is to inflict as much pain as it can." {n}Yrliet's face is twisted with bitterness and disgust.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「これはエンジン・オブ・ペインよ、エランタ。私の歪んだいとこの堕落によって生み出された死刑執行人であり、可能な限りの苦痛を与えることを唯一の目的とするメカニズムと融合した生きた肉体よ」 {n}ユリエットの顔は苦渋と嫌悪で歪んでいる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is an Engine of Pain, elantach. An executioner created by the depravity of my twisted cousins, living flesh fused to a mechanism whose sole purpose is to inflict as much pain as it can." {n}Yrliet's face is contorted with bitterness and disgust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「これはエンジン・オブ・ペインよ、エランタ。私の闇のいとこの堕落によって生み出された死刑執行人であり、可能な限りの苦痛を与えることを唯一の目的とするメカニズムと融合した生きた肉体よ」 {n}ユリエットの顔は苦渋と嫌悪で歪んでいる。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “这是一台痛苦引擎，外界人，是我那些扭曲的黑暗表亲亲手创造出来的怪物。这种怪物由活生生的肉体与机械融合在一起，它们存在的唯一目的就是尽可能地制造痛苦。”{n}伊莉耶特的脸因痛苦与厌恶而扭曲。{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is an Engine of Pain, elantach. An executioner created by the depravity of my twisted cousins, living flesh fused to a mechanism whose sole purpose is to inflict as much pain as it can." {n}Yrliet's face is contorted with bitterness and disgust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这是一台痛苦引擎，外界人，是我那些堕落的黑暗表亲亲手创造出来的怪物。这种怪物由活生生的肉体与机械融合在一起，它们存在的唯一目的就是尽可能地制造痛苦。”{n}伊莉耶特的脸因痛苦与厌恶而扭曲。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Este es un Motor del Dolor, elantach. Un verdugo creado por la depravación de mis retorcidos primos, carne viva fusionada a un mecanismo cuyo único propósito es infligir tanto dolor como pueda». {n}El rostro de Yrliet se retuerce con amargura y repugnancia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is an Engine of Pain, elantach. An executioner created by the depravity of my twisted cousins, living flesh fused to a mechanism whose sole purpose is to inflict as much pain as it can." {n}Yrliet's face is contorted with bitterness and disgust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Este es un Motor del Dolor, elantach. Un verdugo creado por la depravación de mis primos oscuros, carne viva fusionada a un mecanismo cuyo único propósito es infligir tanto dolor como pueda». {n}El rostro de Yrliet se retuerce con amargura y repugnancia.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Dies ist eine Schmerzmaschine, Elantach. Ein Henker, der der Verkommenheit meiner dunklen Vettern entsprang. Lebendes Fleisch, das mit einem Mechanismus verschmolzen wurde, dessen einziger Zweck darin besteht, möglichst viel Schmerz zu verursachen." {n}Yrliet verzieht vor Verbitterung und Abscheu das Gesicht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is an Engine of Pain, elantach. An executioner created by the depravity of my twisted cousins, living flesh fused to a mechanism whose sole purpose is to inflict as much pain as it can." {n}Yrliet's face is contorted with bitterness and disgust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Dies ist eine Schmerzmaschine, Elantach. Ein Henker, der aus der Verkommenheit meiner dunklen Vettern entstanden ist. Lebendes Fleisch, das mit einem Mechanismus verschmolzen wurde, dessen einziger Zweck darin besteht, möglichst viel Schmerz zu verursachen." {n}Yrliet verzieht vor Verbitterung und Abscheu das Gesicht.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « C'est une machine de tourment, elantach. Une créature vouée à tuer, créée par mes vils cousins. De la chair vivante fusionnée à un mécanisme, et qui a pour seule vocation d'infliger le plus de souffrance possible, » {n}explique Yrliet, les traits déformés par l'amertume et le dégoût.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is an Engine of Pain, elantach. An executioner created by the depravity of my twisted cousins, living flesh fused to a mechanism whose sole purpose is to inflict as much pain as it can." {n}Yrliet's face is contorted with bitterness and disgust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est une machine de tourment, elantach. Une créature vouée à tuer, créée par mes sombres cousins. De la chair vivante fusionnée à un mécanisme, et qui a pour seule vocation d'infliger le plus de souffrance possible, » {n}explique Yrliet, les traits déformés par l'amertume et le dégoût.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Bu bir Acı Motoru elantach. Çarpık soydaşlarımın ahlaksızlıkları ile yarattığı, bir tek çektirebildiği kadar acı çektirmeyi amaçlayan, yaşayan dokular ile bir mekanizmanın birleşimi olan bir infazcı." {n}Yrliet'in yüzü, öfke ve tiksintiyle buruşuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "This is an Engine of Pain, elantach. An executioner created by the depravity of my twisted cousins, living flesh fused to a mechanism whose sole purpose is to inflict as much pain as it can." {n}Yrliet's face is contorted with bitterness and disgust.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu bir Acı Motoru elantach. Çarpık kuzenlerimin ahlaksızlıkları ile yarattığı, tek amacı çektirebildiği kadar acı çektirmek olan, yaşayan dokuların ve bir mekanizmanın birleşimi bir infazcı." {n}Yrliet'in yüzü öfke ve tiksintiyle buruşuyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
